reviews.review_msg: I think McAllister is the perfect example of a teacher who "means well" but is in way over her head. She has a fun personality, but as time goes on it becomes clear she has no clue how to give a lecture. A nice woman, but she really gives off a vibe of being ditzy and un-coordinated. Dumb, even.
arrogant, blinded by naive extreme leftist outlook, condemns views that differ
